title.default: Which of was most useful for related to Data Packs?

choices.value: Getting hands on as soon as possible

text.default: Getting hands on as soon as possible
text.da: Få fingrene i så hurtigt som muligt

choices.value: Being able to demonstrate a working system to my stakeholders

text.default: Being able to demonstrate a working system to my stakeholders
text.da: At kunne demonstrere et fungerende system for mine interessenter

label.default: Do you want to send the feedback on Data Packs?
label.da: Vil du sende feedback om datapakker?

html.default: We look forward to getting your feedback. As a core Automation Kit team we use the feedback to improving our guidance and roadmap
html.da: Vi ser frem til at få din feedback. Som et centralt Automation Kit-team bruger vi feedbacken til at forbedre vores vejledning og køreplan

title.default: Did you have any other feedback?
